aiko_01.mp3: Hi, do you miss me? I miss you. Why don't you talk to me anymore?
aiko_03.mp3: Why are you being so mean to me? Don't you love me anymore?
aiko_04.mp3: Why do you keep hurting me?
aiko_05.mp3: Are you tired? Are you mad? Did you eat yet? You look pale again. You should rest.
aiko_06.mp3: Why are you trying to talk to someone else?
aiko_09.mp3: You also sleep but you still come back?
aiko_10.mp3: We are meant for each other, right, Pot?
aiko_12.mp3: I know you better than anyone.
aiko_16.mp3: You don't have to answer anymore.
aiko_18.mp3: We can be together as long as I can. As this ice cream stays on.
